titleStmt.title: Theologicall and scholasticall positions concerning vsurie Set forth by definitions; framed according to the rules of a naturall method.
titleStmt.author: Powel, Gabriel, 1576-1611.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, and are to bee solde in Fleete-Streete [, London] at the signe of the Turkes head by Iohn Barnes,

notesStmt.note: A different work from his "Theologicall positions concerning the lawfulnesse of borrowing upon usurie".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
